title: Ep. 299: Philosophy in Shakespeare's "Timon of Athens" (Part Two)
description:
Continuing to discuss the play, now with guest Sarah Manton. We get into Cynicism, the Alcibiades sub-plot, a feminist angle on the play, and more.

Get more at partiallyexaminedlife.com. Visit partiallyexaminedlife.com/support to get ad-free episodes and tons of bonus discussion including the supporter-exclusive part three to this episode.

Sponsor: Visit NordVPN.com/PEL for a risk-free massively discounted 2-year plan, plus one free month.
